headline.print_headline: U.S. Allows Limited Exceptions to Ivory Ban for Instruments, Art
headline.main: U.S. Allows Limited Exceptions to Ivory Ban for Instruments, Art

lead_paragraph: The U.S. government on Thursday took steps to allow limited exceptions to its broad prohibition on the commercial trade in elephant ivory, exempting certain older musical instruments with ivory components as well as ivory in museum and art exhibitions.
